reviews.text:
Very nice little church of Roman Catholic faith with the adoration room at level 1. The main church is located at level 2.
The level 1 is modeled like a cafe setting.
There are some carpark lots.
It has a little pond with Jesus statue.

The church main service area is air conditioned. Most people know each other.
Chatolic church with beautiful design, convenient amenities, and welcoming atmosphere. The main church is located at level 2 with aircon. I love it!

My first time VISIT,  very nice place, design of the  building is amazing,  after attend the mass  I am surprise because they have free meal  after 9:30am mass .  I dont know  if is coincident or  every after am mass they have a  meal?  Will come back again soon..

The Church of Saint Michael is a beautiful, quiet and peaceful Roman Catholic Church that is located about 2 bus stops away from Boon Keng mrt station. There are many buses that goes there but you need to walk a little distance to get to the church.

Church of St Michael gives you the feeling of calmness. Very friendly office staffs that are accommodating and answers your queries quickly. The Catechism classes conducted for young catholics is awesome and it's fun as well. Love the sculptures within the church. Small carpark, hence you may want to park your car at the nearest HDB carpark instead during peak period.
